title: FLY TRAP
directions: fill with warm water to the base of the handle and shake well. Poke five or six holes above liquid line with a sharp knife that are big enough for flies to crawl into. Place jug in the problem area. This jug has been on our porch since Saturday morning and our fly problem is now resolved- lots of dead flies inside the jug by end of the first day! üëçüèª Bye Bye Bugs!!!
ingredients: In an empty milk jug, put a 1/2 cup pancake syrup, 3-4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar, and a tablespoon of dish washing liquid
